alert.note: Alert for Buffalo; Kearney (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:08PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Kearney and southeastern Buffalo Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 507 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Riverdale, or near Kearney, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Gibbon around 520 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Shelton. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 265 and 292. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
